tool_description: Easily convert HTML content to a PNG, JPG, JPEG, SVG, and BMP!
name: HTML to image
title: HTML to image

api_list.name: Generate image with chrome
api_list.description: Same as the html-to-image endpoint, but supports fewer values and tends to be slower
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://html-to-image2.p.rapidapi.com/html-to-image-chrome"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-to-image2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
